title: Fragment, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: double cloth with cut and uncut supplementary warp pile, warps resist-dyed before weaving
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Herman A. Elsberg
description: Double velvet weave with dark red on one side and a foliate pattern in blue, yellow, green and white ikat on a red ground.
